predicate.note: Frames file for 'breach' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no Framenet entry. Comparison with 'break'.

roleset.name: break

example.name: breach the agreement
example.text: Under a merger agreement reached Sept. 14, the UAL board agreed to reimburse certain of the buy-out group's expenses out of company funds even if the transaction wasn't completed, provided the group didn't breach the agreement.

roleset.note: This is rarely used as a real verb, instead usually occuring as a noun: "A breach of contract" etc. It is also used as of a whale coming up for air, but let's just assume that sense won't occur in WSJ.
